title: Enhancing Healthcare Practice Competencies: Analysis and Optimization of Mobile-Based Language Learning Media Utilization Patterns

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Classify personal language learning media usage patterns in mobile environments using Latent Class Analysis (LCA).
Design personalized media utilization strategies based on analysis results to improve language learning efficiency by over 20%.
Diagnose one’s own profile among entertainment users, peripheral users, advanced users, and instrumental users through project outcomes.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
